roleset.name: to surround or harass (as with questions or requests)

example.name: passive
example.text: GE Chairman John Welch has been `` besieged with phone calls '' complaining about his unit 's program trading , according to a person close to him .
example.arg: with phone calls '' complaining about his unit 's program trading

roleset.note: BESIEGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'besiege' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from besiege.01-v predicate notes)
SIEGE-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from siege.01-n)
